# Animal Spirit, Mass (Spell)
## Overview
[[Divination Spells|Divination]] \[[[Divination Spells|incarnum]]]

**Level:** [[6th Level Druid Spells|Druid 6]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 12th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 12]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S (E)

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** Up to one creature/level

**Duration:** 1 hour/level or until discharged

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Magic of Incarnum (Wotc), pg. 99

As *[[Animal Spirit (Spell)|animal spirit]]*, except as noted above. Each target must activate his own *[[Animal Spirit (Spell)|animal spirit]]* separately.
